content: Hi - trying to comment last minute (as usual) . I am a little confused by the ballot rule statement, "The specification has been updated to include R3/R4 maps and difference analysis, but these have not been updated" " as to whether or not I can rely on the AR and AB links to let me look only at the changes - if not, then how do I know what the commentable changes are?
the commentable changes are the differences between this ballot and the last ballot, not between R4 and R3.
every page includes a link at the bottom to compare with the last ballot
I'm back to pushing on this. Is anyone going to be interested in helping out with this in the next 2-3 weeks?
Me and @Kenneth Myhra are working on it
I know how to finish the 4 outstanding maps I've got and there's just 2 on the list now
